argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | suppmptcfin.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | suppmptcfin.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 3 |  | suppmptcfin.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | suppmptcfin.1 | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 5 |  | suppmptcfin.f | |- F = ( x e. V |-> if ( x = X , .1. , .0. ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_funmpt2 | |- Fun F |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B /\ X e. V ) -> Fun F ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_suppmptcfin | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B /\ X e. V ) -> ( F supp .0. ) e. Fin ) |
| 9 |  | #P_mptexg | |- ( V e. ~P B -> ( x e. V |-> if ( x = X , .1. , .0. ) ) e. _V ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( V e. ~P B -> F e. _V ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B /\ X e. V ) -> F e. _V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` R ) e. _V |
| 13 | 3, 12 | #P_eqeltri | |- .0. e. _V |
| 14 |  | #P_isfsupp | |- ( ( F e. _V /\ .0. e. _V ) -> ( F finSupp .0. <-> ( Fun F /\ ( F supp .0. ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 13, 14 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B /\ X e. V ) -> ( F finSupp .0. <-> ( Fun F /\ ( F supp .0. ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 8, 15 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B /\ X e. V ) -> F finSupp .0. ) |
